Text:
SOMBODY PLLLLZZZZZZZZZZZZZHELP!
i can't seem to dld this............a msg keeps comin up sayin 'file exceeds filesystem limit.
GOT A REMEDY FOR THIS ?
Remedy is to format your hard drive to ntfs so that it will accept files that are larger than 4 gb.  Just do a google search for "convert fat to ntfs" and you will get the instructions.
Sadly this video is not the native resolution of the source so the image appears to be squished...
